name: HOT VIEW ECCHI GIRLS
description:
HOT VIEW ECCHI GIRLS is an ordinary puzzle game. But only in this game you can enjoy a variety of hot girls.

Collect the entire collection of hot girls in your gallery and be the happiest person on earth, but for this you need to complete all levels.

Game features:
* Relaxing background music
* Varied selection of hot girls
* Pleasant pastime

All characters are over 18 years old.
